title: PowBlocks
author: PowBlocks
created_time: September 05, 2023, 07:42:45 PMLast edit: October 11, 2023, 08:07:35 AM by PowBlocks
content: We are excited to introduce PowBlocks, a cutting-edge layer-1 blockchain that harks back to the core principles of blockchain technology. With a focus on decentralization, security, and innovation, PowBlocks is set to redefine the landscape of blockchain networks.Key Features of PowBlocks:1. Ethash Proof of Work (POW): We have adopted the Ethash algorithm to ensure the security and decentralization of our network.2. Rooted in Decentralization: Our mission is to bring power back to the community. PowBlocks is designed to be truly decentralized, with no single entity controlling the network.3. Innovation at Its Core: PowBlocks is committed to pushing the boundaries of blockchain technology. Stay tuned for exciting updates and developments!4. Community-Driven: We believe in the power of our community. Join us on this journey and help shape the future of PowBlocks.Why PowBlocks?In a world filled with complex blockchain projects, PowBlocks goes back to the basics. We believe that true decentralization is the cornerstone of blockchain technology, and we're committed to upholding these principles.* No premine, no presale.* Harcoded block halving feature.* Dev fee for only first few blocks.* Proper difficulty adjustment from launch.Get Involved:Be a part of the PowBlocks community and stay updated on our progress. Follow us on social media, join our Discord, and keep an eye on our website for upcoming announcements.✅ Official Website: https://powblocks.com/ ✅ Github: https://github.com/PowBlocks ✅ Twitter: https://twitter.com/PowBlocks ✅ Discord: https://discord.gg/VKXp8ZAr ✅ Telegram Ann: https://t.me/PowBlocks ✅ Telegram Chat: https://t.me/PowBlocksChat Stay tuned for more updates, and let's embark on this exciting journey together as we revisit the roots of blockchain technology with PowBlocks!

comments.author: rocky45
comments.body: Quote from: reb0rn21 on September 05, 2023, 09:43:50 PMBut he is right we see nothing new here at all........I agree with this statement. The number of alt coins in existence nowadays is crazy, over 30k? Maybe slightly more when you count in the smart contracts, tokens and NFTs.. It's just becoming more ridiculous with the exception of some very few useful projects.In short, if you'd like to compete in this highly-saturated market, you have to do more instead of writing some text, providing an explorer, a github, a wallet and a discord for a new coin..

comments.author: PowBlocks
comments.body: PowBlocks vs other Ethash coins!* No premine, no presale.* Harcoded block halving feature.* Dev fee for only first few blocks.* Proper difficulty adjustment from launch.Our mainnet will go live soon, stay tuned!

comments.author: PowBlocks
comments.body: Yesterday, a poll was conducted to determine the preferred approach for adjusting block rewards, with two options on the table: "annual block reward halving (50% reduction)" or "monthly 5% reduction in block rewards." The majority of participants voted in favor of the second option, and as a result, we will be implementing the monthly 5% reduction. Block reward for miners will be set at 9 coins per block at the beginning.Mainnet launch countdown: https://www.timeanddate.com/countdown/launch?iso=20230908T13&p0=4508&msg=PowBlocks+Mainnet+Launch&font=slab&csz=1

comments.author: PowBlocks
comments.body: The source code for PowBlocks, along with Linux and Windows clients, has been officially released. We'll be uploading the genesis file at the time of launch. Stay tuned for further updates!✅ Source Code: https://github.com/PowBlocks/go-PowBlocks ✅ Downloads: https://github.com/PowBlocks/go-PowBlocks/releases/tag/V1.0.0

comments.author: PowBlocks
comments.body: 📢 Exciting News! PowBlocks Whitepaper Released!We are thrilled to announce the official release of the PowBlocks Whitepaper! 🚀This comprehensive document provides detailed insights into PowBlocks, a dedicated decentralized layer-1 proof-of-work blockchain designed for the mining community. The whitepaper covers a wide range of topics, including our unique emission model, the ingrained 5% block reward reduction per month, our commitment to decentralization, and much more.Here's what you'll find in the whitepaper:✅ Mission to be the largest Proof of Work chain✅ Emphasis on fairness, innovation, and community involvement✅ Successful mainnet launch with a 1T difficulty setting✅ Significance of the name "PowBlocks"✅ Smart contract and EVM compatibility✅ Community-driven philosophyYou can access the complete PowBlocks Whitepaper by following this link: https://powblocks.com/whitepaper/ We invite you to dive into the details and discover how PowBlocks is revolutionizing the mining ecosystem. Your feedback and insights are valuable to us, so feel free to share your thoughts after reading the whitepaper.Stay tuned for more exciting updates from the PowBlocks community! 🌐
